Articles.Content:
Is there a mod or a part, or anything, to make a folding door (i'm not sure if this is the right name for it)?

I want to create a big truck that can carry a rover inside, but I want to make a ramp so the rover can get inside the truck, when lowered the truck door would be the ramp, when close it would seal the back. Is there anyway I can achieve this? Below I depict what I mean.

Edited November 16, 2013 by ebatata
Try Infernal Robotics, it comes with all kinds of hinges and stuff to make that happen.

Infernal robotics would do it like mats said, There are a couple planetary base mods (H.O.M.E. comes to mind) that have rover bases which you might be able to stick onto the back of a truck, and I know the B9 aerospace mod has some cargo bays with ramps designed for cargo aircraft.
